title: 4K - Eye of the Dead 1960 - Tormented by the She-Ghost of Haunted Island! Romantic Horror

sources.title: 4K - Eye of the Dead 1960 - Tormented by the She-Ghost of Haunted Island! Romantic Horror
sources.description:
A ghost-woman owned him body and soul!
Pianist Tom Stewart lets jilted fianc√©e Vi Mason plunge to her death, only to find her vengeful ghost haunting his wedding plans with wealthy Meg Hubbard.  As Vi's spectral antics escalate, Tom scrambles to silence the past and eliminate evidence, forcing a deadly showdown where he must face the consequences head-on.

Original title: Tormented (1960)
Directed & Written by Bert I. Gordon

Main cast:
Richard Carlson - Tom Stewart
Susan Gordon - Sandy Hubbard
Lugene Sanders - Meg Hubbard
Juli Reding - Vi Mason
Joe Turkel - Nick (the beatnik ferryman)
Lillian Adams - Mrs. Ellis
Gene Roth - Mr. Nelson
Vera Marsh - Mrs. Hubbard

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/tR7VELBhxL4

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdZjOUSqIZM6IdRizGyMIXjz
